properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 8 at 2:07PM PST until February 9 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 18 to 21 feet at 13 seconds. A few isolated gusts to 35
possible into early this evening. Winds will ease later this
evening. Seas will slowly subside, down to 13 to 15 ft after
midnight.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from shore out 60 miles, from Cape
Shoalwater to Cascade Head.

* WHEN...Until noon Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions may be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
